page.title: 09A Family Day
page.content: On Saturday we get up at 9 o'clock. I go downstairs and set the table while Mummy makes breakfast. Then we sit down on a bench to have breakfast. For breakfast Mummy, Wendy and I have cereal and Daddy has egg and bacon. Then we go upstairs and get dressed. Then we come downstairs and watch television. At 11 o'clock we set off to go to Grandma's. When we get to Grandma's house (which is in Harrogate) we get some fish and chips from across the road and Wendy, Daddy, Andrew, Carl and I play snooker while Mummy, Grandma and Grandad talk. At teatime Grandad makes curry and we all enjoy it. After that we go home, have a drink of milk and go to bed. My bed is comfortable and I sleep well.
